answers.answer: I haven't been a welder per se, but I've worked a lot of handyman jobs, and I had to weld couple times. On some of those jobs. So, yeah, I had a little bit of experience, probably, like, 18 total hours welding.

Yeah. I'm pretty technical. I'm good with blueprinting, through schematic. Understanding diagrams, things like that. I took a few CAD classes in high school, actually developing schematics So, yeah, pretty comfortable.
Not really. I mean, I guess I've, like, welded a couple, like, of the frame of the car to the the body once, welded it in a few places. But yeah. Don't have, like, a ton of experience.
